author: hopeh920
title: Thankful for Quiet NYC Sleeping arrngements
text: This property is central to all your needs when visiting NYC - Staff is great and room is quiet. Speedline is close by too! I throughly enjoyed myself and felt safe at this location. I would rcommend and probably stay in the future
